<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Good morning. </strong>Can you believe it's the last day of 2019? And the decade? </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">As we count down the minutes until 2020, Morning Brew is returning to our bread-and-butter: <span style="text-decoration: line-through;">business news</span> trivia. Yes, this newsletter is entirely devoted to quizzing you on your knowledge of the 2010s, from famous quotes to baby names. For the most part, you'll find the answers at the bottom of each section (so don't peek). </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Alright, take out your pencils and good luck! </p>

</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">

<tr>
<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Can you name these prominent companies from the last decade? (H/t to the <a href="https://twitter.com/nyse/status/1019313638832734209?lang=en&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">NYSE</a> for the idea.)</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">1. <img src="https://emojipedia-us.s3.dualstack.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/thumbs/120/apple/237/bed_1f6cf.png" class="img-responsive" width="18" style="width:100% !important;max-width: 18px;" alt=""> <img src="https://emojipedia-us.s3.dualstack.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/thumbs/120/apple/237/bath_1f6c0.png" class="img-responsive" width="18" style="width:100% !important;max-width: 18px;" alt=""> <img src="https://emojipedia-us.s3.dualstack.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/thumbs/120/google/223/milky-way_1f30c.png" class="img-responsive" width="18" style="width:100% !important;max-width: 18px;" alt=""></p>

<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">This decade, athletes surprised us with their physical dexterity and their interlocution. Can you name the athlete behind the quote?</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">1. “You know, when I was with the Yankees and we won the world championship and you’re wearing the pinstripes, you think you are pretty cool. But then when you hang out with Jennifer, people confuse me as a security guard all the time.”</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">2. "We have pink hair and purple hair. We have tattoos and dreadlocks. We've got white girls and black girls and everything in between. We've got straight girls and gay girls…HEYYY!"</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">3. “This is our f****** city.” </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">4. "We'll never change the name. It's that simple. NEVER—you can use caps."</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">5. “Growing up I wasn’t the richest, but I had a rich family in spirit. Standing here with 19 championships is something I never thought would happen. I went on a court just with a ball and a racket and with a hope.” </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">6. "I view this situation as one big lie that I repeated a lot of times." </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">(<a href="https://www.yardbarker.com/general_sports/articles/the_2010s_50_notable_quotes_of_the_decade/s1__30541562#slide_16?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Source</a>)</p>
